posts.author: Hannah
posts.title: Fertility journey
posts.body: Has anyone else struggled with fertility? Any tips you can share on how you made it through?   Read this article the other day. Hard topic, but this woman has a lot of grace and strength.   https://www.popsugar.com/family/How-I-Cope-Disappointment-Infertility-45942645

posts.author: Myia
posts.title: What do you actually need to pack for your hospital bag?
posts.body: So i been slowly packing my hospital bag since I'm getting closer to having my daughter, but I'm not really sure what products i should actually be packing.

posts.author: Corina
posts.title: Help! 2 month old won’t take naps!
posts.body: Anyone have any advice to help my 2 month old take naps during the day. Some days he will sleep most of the day and other days I’m lucky if he takes an hour nap all day long until bedtime.

posts.author: Yess
posts.title: PP sex
posts.body: So it’s been a month since having my bby. And we had sex today with a condom of course.. but the thing is.. I’m worried because it felt different to me. I wasn’t feeling it like before. He says it didn’t feel same because of the condom but I’m still worried.. was it the condom? 😥😥

posts.author: Maria
posts.title: New birth control help?
posts.body: I'm going next week to get new birth control since my IUD fell out a couple months ago.. I know I cant do a pill because I'll forget and wind up pregnant,  I'm allergic to the patches, I wouldn't mind another IUD but which one, I had paragard but I dont want a period and I dont want to gain wieght lol I know I'm being picky but I'm a little nervous lol

posts.author: Destiny
posts.title: Nursing clothes!
posts.body: In need of nursing bras & clothing! Send me your favorites and where I can get them! Thank you 💙💙🙏🙏

posts.author: Shaeley
posts.title: Baby registry
posts.body: So im 25 weeks today, and my mom is planning a baby shower for me at the end of june/beginning of july. Its kinda early (im due aug 31st) but i live in florida and my whole family lives in Michigan so id have to fly home and i dont really want to fly too late in my pregnancy. Anyways im going to be using amazon for my registry just because i need all the gifts shipped to my house in florida. Has anyone else ever dealt with a situation like this? Should i make a statement telling people that i need it shipped and not to actually bring anything cause i mean my mom said she would mail stuff that people do end up bringing but it could get expensive depending on gifts i get. Also im a FTM so what are some absolute must haves that you ladies put on your registry??? I basically have nothing and im starting to get stressed out lol so i at least wanna get started on that.

posts.author: Tam
posts.title: Prince Harry to take Paternity Leave?!👑❤️
posts.body: Who’s other half is also taking paternity leave? How’s it working out for you? 🙂Would love to hear about your experiences - thanks ladies!😘😘  https://www.popsugar.co.uk/parenting/Prince-Harry-Take-Paternity-Leave-45945610?utm_medium=redirect&utm_campaign=US:GB&utm_source=direct  ☝️xo

posts.author: Dani
posts.title: Hypnobirthing
posts.body: Have any of you mommas tried hypnobirthing? I did with my last baby and plan to with this one(30 weeks pregnant). Part of me is nervous and the other part excited to see how it compares to my last baby’s birth.

posts.author: Cheren
posts.title: Microblading
posts.body: Did any of you mommas got their eyebrows microbladed? I had pretty much none so I decided to do it because I don’t like wearing make up. I’m now 4 weeks post procedure  and they don’t look as thick and dark as I’d like. I know I have to wait for the second touch up appointment to fill in the bald spots but I’m getting worried about the final result. If you had them done, do you still need to use make up to make them look fuller?
